text_block_list.name: Monologue
text_block_list.text:
With all of Symboli Rudolf's races over,<n>now is as
good a time as any to reflect<n>on her
achievements.
choice_data_list:
I never dreamed you'd claim more than seven
crowns!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Even I am astonished by the magnitude<n>of what I
have accomplished.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
But it is you who deserves the credit.<n>None of this
would have been possible<n>without your unfailing
guidance.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Thank you, Trainer. You have made me<n>the
swiftest Umamusume there ever was.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
I should thank my lucky stars that I<n>chose you that
day... Or perhaps I should<n>say that you chose me.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
No, it is thanks toâ€”wait, I see where this<n>is going.
At this rate, we will be<n>complimenting one
another all day.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Let us call it a draw and say that wewere both responsible.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Now, I do believe we've earned<n>ourselves
something of a reward,<n>wouldn't you say?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Something worthy of commemorating<n>this
monumental feat.
choice_data_list: What could live up to that?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Struggling for ideas? Well, truth be told,<n>so am I.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Haha... Thinking of gifts for oneself isn't<n>easy, is
it?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
But fortunately, we have a great deal of<n>time. If
we put our heads together, I'm<n>certain we'll
succeed.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Not least because time spent with you is<n>as much
of a reward as any.
